src:
Lawan Tira Persikabo, Persebaya Terancam Tanpa David da Silva
06 Nov 2019, 20:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya terancam tanpa David da Silva dalam lawatan ke markas PS Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019). Sebab, pemain berpaspor Brasil tersebut masih dibekap cedera.
David juga tidak hadir dalam latihan di Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, Rabu (6/11/2019) sore. Sehingga tim pelatih belum bisa memutuskan apakah dia akan dibawa atau tidak.
"Si David kondisinya masih fifty-fifty bisa berangkat atau tidak," kata pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso usai memimpin latihan.
Aji tak menampik bahwa keberadaan David sangat dibutuhkan oleh Persebaya. Mengingat tim kebanggaan Kota Pahlawan tersebut hanya memiliki satu penyerang murni.
"Dari kuantitas kebutuhan striker, kami sebenarnya tidak ideal karena cuma satu striker, tapi memang saya masuk dengan kondisi seperti itu coba saya maksimalkan," jelasnya.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Opponent Tira Persikabo, Persebaya Threatened Without David da Silva
Nov 6 2019, 20:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya is threatened without David da Silva on a visit to the PS Tira Persikabo headquarters, Saturday (11/09/2019). Because, the Brazilian passport player is still smothering injuries.
David also did not attend the training at the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium, Surabaya, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon. So the coach team has not been able to decide whether he will be taken or not.
"The David condition is still fifty-fifty can go or not," said Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso after leading the training.
Aji did not deny that the existence of David was needed by Persebaya. Given the pride of the City of Heroes the team only has one pure attacker.
"From the quantity of striker needs, we are actually not ideal because there is only one striker, but indeed I entered with such conditions I try to maximize," he explained.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
